page.title: 05Entertainments
page.content: Pickering has a good{library, }which is situated on the Ropery opposite the car-park. Those people who like{horse-riding} can go to the riding stables at Beck-Isle.It will cost Â£1.65 for half an hour. If you enjoy swimming, then there is a{Swimming pool.}The charges are 20p for children and 65p for adults. Pickering contains many{hotels.}The largest one is the Forest and Vale. At the{Ryedale and Pickering {Recreation clubs}many people play or watch sport. Pantomimes and musicals are performed at{The Kirk Theatre,}which used to be a church until it was converted about a year ago. If you prefer the{cinema}then there is the Castle Cinema in Burgate.
